issues.title: Delay between joining activity and shared image shown
issues.body: There's a bit of a delay with "No image" shown, between the joining shared activity alert, and the image appearing.

commits.message:
Fix choose an image button

When a new instance of ImageViewer is started, the "Choose an image"
does not work.  A traceback is in log;

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/share/sugar/activities/ImageViewer.activity/ImageViewerActivity.py", line 396, in _show_picker_cb
    if not self._want_document:
AttributeError: 'ImageViewerActivity' object has no attribute '_want_document'

Regression caused by d496604 which removed the initialisation of the
attribute from the object.
Update POT file

Fix file transfer

- remove unused import,

- remove future import of sugar3.presence, the feature has not landed
  and does not seem likely to,

- switch to a bare import of collabwrapper module,

- qualify FT_STATE_COMPLETED which was previously unresolved yet
  generated no runtime warnings.

collabwrapper OutgoingFileTransfer _get_input_stream not returned

Caught with flake8, F841 local variable 'input_stream' is assigned to
but never used.

Looks like the intent is to return the value.

flake8 fixes

Unlikely to be controversial.
Update POT file
translate.sugarlabs.org synchronisation

Update repository URL

- use HTTPS transport, fixes git clone on systems that don't have an SSH
  key for github.com,

- follow recent redirect from godiard/ to sugarlabs/

fix overexposed render of Record photographs

ImageViewer-59 on Fedora 20 did "overexpose" photograph images taken by
Record activity.  Cause unknown.

Change creation of the Cairo surface to match the method found in the
Paint activity.  Fixes problem, no idea why.

Reported-by: tkkang@nurturingasia.com
Signed-off-by: James Cameron <quozl@laptop.org>
code review, quozl@laptop.org

issue_comments.body: Tested on Ubuntu 16.04 and 16.10; the icons have changed properly.  I'll go and close 4830.

commits.message:
Expose "leader" gprop for CollabWrapper

This also means that the way leader is set in single user mode
needed to be changed to move towards meeting the garuentees set
out in the docs.  (Emphasis is on the "should" in the docs)
Port to using collab wrapper api

Merge pull request #20 from quozl/2017-080-po

translate.sugarlabs.org synchronisation

Merge pull request #17 from quozl/2016-146-repo

Update repository URL

Merge pull request #15 from leonardcj/master

push from pootle
Version 62
Pep8 and pyflakes fixes
Use object chooser with preview if available
Restart a instance without a file should show the emptypanel
Commit from Sugar Labs by user godiard.: 16 of 16 strings translated (0 need review).
Remove non standard fields from activity.info file
Version 61
Set max_participants in activity.info file
Pep8 fixes
Version 60
Update repository information in activity.info
Fix broken .po files

Merge branch 'gtk3'

Resolved conflicts:
	NEWS
	activity/activity.info
	po/ar.po
	po/ayc.po
	po/bn_IN.po
	po/fr.po
	po/hy.po
	po/it.po
	po/ne.po
	po/pap.po
	po/pbs.po
	po/pt.po
	po/pt_BR.po
	po/quz.po

Updates activity icon

This icon was provided by Michael Strelan

Signed-oof-by: Gonzalo Odiard <gonzalo@laptop.org>

Signed-off-by: Agustin Zubiaga <aguz@sugarlabs.org>

Pep8 fixes

Signed-off-by: Gonzalo Odiard <gonzalo@laptop.org>
Signed-off-by: Agustin Zubiaga <aguz@sugarlabs.org>

Replace the gtk dialog used to show transferece progress by a Alert

Signed-off-by: Gonzalo Odiard <gonzalo@laptop.org>
Signed-off-by: Agustin Zubiaga <aguz@sugarlabs.org>

Enable collaboration only when a file is loaded

Right now, ImageViewer activity can start without a file loaded,
showing the empty panel and a button to open the object chooser.
If the user try sharing the session before a book is opened,
the collaboration is broken, because no file is available to share.
This patch disable collaboration until a file is opened.

Signed-off-by: Gonzalo Odiard <gonzalo@laptop.org>
Signed-off-by: Agustin Zubiaga <aguz@sugarlabs.org>

Avoid error opening the image with the object chooser - SL #4540

read_file do not open the file if _object_id is not set.

Signed-off-by: Gonzalo Odiard <gonzalo@laptop.org>
Signed-off-by: Agustin Zubiaga <aguz@sugarlabs.org>

Fix collaboration - SL #4520

Collaboration was broken partially by the remove of __set_file_idle_cb
in 17acb8ec0e72ead145c3d2648707af87b8ff5cf5 and posterior changes.
Now restored the method, but use as a parameter the object_id instead
of the tempfile path, because this change after the file is saved in the
journal.
We also needed add a control in read_file due to the use of the
emptypanel.

Signed-off-by: Gonzalo Odiard <gonzalo@laptop.org>

Version 52

Signed-off-by: Agustin Zubiaga <aguz@sugarlabs.org>

Update summary

Signed-off-by: Gonzalo Odiard <gonzalo@laptop.org>
Signed-off-by: Agustin Zubiaga <aguz@sugarlabs.org>

Initial gesture support

Only zoom is implemented, but not rotate.

Signed-off-by: Gonzalo Odiard <gonzalo@laptop.org>
Signed-off-by: Agustin Zubiaga <aguz@sugarlabs.org>

Use similar surface to improve performance

Signed-off-by: Gonzalo Odiard <gonzalo@laptop.org>
Signed-off-by: Agustin Zubiaga <aguz@sugarlabs.org>

issue_comments.body: merged and released a new version

Ok, then a part pending is run the query in the datastore in a method called using idle_add, to avid make activity startup slower. The other is check we don't break collaboration with this change. At least we should disable the buttons when collaboration stars.
@goutamnair7 , these are the changes I did: https://github.com/godiard/imageviewer-activity/commit/3611324144a4652bbbd0c19b82748c1ec3d6d9fc

Hi @goutamnair7,
I think I didn't explained well the issue with the pep8 issues.
You don't need make the changes I already did in https://github.com/godiard/imageviewer-activity/commit/3611324144a4652bbbd0c19b82748c1ec3d6d9fc.
You need update your repository to get the last changes (See http://developer.sugarlabs.org/contributing.md.html#keep%20your%20fork%20up%20to%20date) 
and just be sure your code don't add more pep8 errors. 
To check this, in the terminal do "pep8 *.py"
You will see these errors:

```
[gonzalo@localhost imageviewer-activity]$ pep8 *.py
ImageViewerActivity.py:276:64: E127 continuation line over-indented for visual indent
ImageViewerActivity.py:335:49: E127 continuation line over-indented for visual indent
ImageViewerActivity.py:449:41: E126 continuation line over-indented for hanging indent
ImageViewerActivity.py:450:41: E128 continuation line under-indented for visual indent
```

Tell me on irc if you need help.
Thanks for working on this and take the time to get it right. It's  merged now.
I didn't pushed this change due to http://bugs.sugarlabs.org/ticket/4830

@godiard Also, I checked for pep8 in ImageViewerActivity.py and I did not get any errors. So, what are the changes which you made?
@godiard Okay. So, do I make a new commit here or do I make a new pr?

Bump v22
Update spec to not fail in SN
Fullscreen is useless #3704
Bump v21
Bump v20
Package
Bump v19
Do not break php ini parser
Tune NEWS
Polish AUTHORS file
Update .pot file
Bump v17
Restore zoom while switching back from fullscreen

Image Viewer consumes large amounts of memory and CPU, does not view images #2567

There is no need in scaling images while rotating.
Bump v16
Add "Original author" to the AUTHORS file
Apply sugar-lint fixes; add HACKING file; make it useful under sweets

Collaboration did not work because not initialized correctly ProgressDialog

Signed-off-by: Agustin Zubiaga <aguz@sugarlabs.org>

Zoom Gesture zooms through the gesture's center

When two fingers are used to zoom in/out the image, the center of the
gesture is used to zoom the image through it.

Signed-off-by: Manuel Kaufmann <humitos@gmail.com>
Signed-off-by: Agustin Zubiaga <aguz@sugarlabs.org>

Rotate, Zoom and center the image

Improves the rotation by centering the image on the screen when it is
smaller than the screen size.

Optimal zoom is calculated for images than are higher in hight when
they are rotated as well.

Fixed rotation (anti)clockwise. X, Y axis + angles in gradians are
handled different by cairo.

Signed-off-by: Manuel Kaufmann <humitos@gmail.com>
Signed-off-by: Agustin Zubiaga <aguz@sugarlabs.org>

Scale the image through its center

Signed-off-by: Manuel Kaufmann <humitos@gmail.com>
Signed-off-by: Agustin Zubiaga <aguz@sugarlabs.org>

Port to cairo

This patch ports GdkPixbuf to cairo.

Signed-off-by: Manuel Kaufmann <humitos@gmail.com>
Signed-off-by: Agustin Zubiaga <aguz@sugarlabs.org>

sl#1504: preserve zoom while rotating

Earlier image used to go down to its original size while rotating .This patch
will keep zoom factor into account while rotating

Signed-off-by: Mukesh Gupta <mukeshgupta.2006@gmail.com>

Merge branch 'master' of gitorious@git.sugarlabs.org:imageviewer/mainline

Sharing: Add progressbar and cancel button.

Add a progressbar to indicate amount downloaded and a cancel button to cancel the download.
Bump version to 10
Add sharing support
Release 6
Prepare for releasing version 6
Fix MANIFEST file
Bump version to 5
